channel.title: Comments on: Year-end list-making just got easier

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: you think? i find that more than half my choices are represented.
item.content:encoded: you think? i find that more than half my choices are represented.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description:
the problem with catbirdseat's list, despite its attempt to be helpful (read: condescendingly snotty), is that some of those records are just bloody fucking awful, or so obscure as if they're an attempt at a parlay into a bigger blogging gig.
that said, that dirty projectors record is abso-stunning-lutley gorgeous.
item.content:encoded:
the problem with catbirdseat’s list, despite its attempt to be helpful (read: condescendingly snotty), is that some of those records are just bloody fucking awful, or so obscure as if they’re an attempt at a parlay into a bigger blogging gig.

that said, that dirty projectors record is abso-stunning-lutley gorgeous.
